goal: Complete refs package with all D&D 5e type namespaces for IDE-discoverable, type-safe references

completed: Phase 1: Added Type constants to module.go (TypeAbilities, TypeSkills, TypeBackgrounds, TypeLanguages, TypeFightingStyles, TypeDamageTypes, TypeTools, TypeArmor)
Phase 1: Created refs/abilities.go with all 6 abilities (str, dex, con, int, wis, cha)
Phase 1: Created refs/weapons.go with all 37 weapons from weapons/common.go
Phase 1: Created refs/armor.go with all 13 armor types from armor/armor.go
Phase 1: Created refs/damage_types.go with all 13 damage types from damage/damage.go
Phase 2: Created refs/races.go with 9 base races + 9 subraces (18 total)
Phase 2: Created refs/skills.go with all 18 D&D 5e skills
Phase 2: Created refs/backgrounds.go with 13 base backgrounds + 4 variants (17 total)
Phase 2: Created refs/languages.go with 8 standard + 8 exotic languages (16 total)
Phase 3: Created refs/fighting_styles.go with 6 fighting styles (Archery, Defense, Dueling, GreatWeaponFighting, Protection, TwoWeaponFighting)
Phase 3: Created refs/tools.go with 35 tools (17 artisan, 4 gaming, 10 musical, 4 other)
Phase 3: Created refs/spells.go with 133 spells (41 cantrips, 92 leveled spells levels 1-5)

next_steps: Phase 4: Expand refs/features.go with missing features
Phase 4: Expand refs/conditions.go with missing conditions
Add tests for all new namespaces
